data.name: Starbound - Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
Purchase the Starbound OST for access to the game's full soundtrack, composed by Curtis Schweitzer and Solatrus. Also contains a whole bunch of experimental tracks not available in the finished game.

The soundtrack contains a whopping 60 tracks for a total of 5 hours and 44 minutes of play time.


Track List

  • 01 Horsehead Nebula
  • 02 Stellar Formation
  • 03 Eridanus Supervoid
  • 04 Haiku
  • 05 Cygnus X1
  • 06 Psyche
  • 07 Large Magellanic Cloud
  • 08 Epsilon Indi
  • 09 Hymn to the Stars
  • 10 Europa
  • 11 Atlas
  • 12 Casiopeia

  • 14 Temple of Kluex
  • 15 Mira
  • 16 Procyon
  • 17 Blue Straggler
  • 18 Nomads (Passacaglia)
  • 19 Accretion Disc
  • 20 Tranquility Base
  • 21 Vast, Immortal Suns
  • 22 (Experimental OST) Arctic Battle 1
  • 23 (Experimental OST) Arctic Battle 2
  • 24 (Experimental OST) Arctic Battle 3

  • 26 (Experimental OST) Arctic Constellation 2
  • 27 (Experimental OST) Arctic Exploration 1
  • 28 (Experimental OST) Arctic Exploration 2
  • 29 (Experimental OST) Crystal Battle 1

  • 31 (Experimental OST) Crystal Exploration 2
  • 32 (Experimental OST) Desert Battle 2

  • 39 (Experimental OST) Ocean Battle 1
  • 40 (Experimental OST) Ocean Exploration 2
  • 41 (Experimental OST) Tentacle Battle 1
  • 42 (Experimental OST) Tentacle Exploration 1
  • 43 (Experimental OST) Planetarium
  • 44 (Experimental OST) On the Beach at Night-- Original Version
  • 45 The Apex

data.short_description: Purchase the Starbound OST for access to the game's full soundtrack, composed by Curtis Schweitzer and Solatrus. Also contains a whole bunch of experimental tracks not available in the finished game. The soundtrack contains a whopping 60 tracks for a total of 5 hours and 44 minutes of play time.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Storage: 750 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows XP
  • Storage: 750 MB available space

  • Storage: 750 MB available space
